Job Position: Social Media Specialist

Job Location:&nbsp;&nbsp;Abule-Egba, Lagos
Employment Type: Part-time

Position Overview


	We are seeking a creative and passionate Social Media Specialist to lead our church&rsquo;s online presence. This role is perfect for a storyteller at heart&mdash;someone who loves to design, write, and share content that inspires, encourages and engages.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and manage a consistent social media content calendar.
	Create inspiring and visually engaging posts, reels, stories, and videos for platforms like Instagram, Facebook, YouTube and TikTok.
	Capture and share moments from worship services, ministries and community events.
	Write thoughtful captions that connect people with scriptures, sermons and church life.
	Foster engagement by responding to comments, messages, and interactions in a warm and Christ-centered way.
	Stay updated on creative trends in social media and adapts them for ministry purposes.


Qualifications


	2+ years of experience in content creation, social media management or digital storytelling.
	Personal relationship with Jesus Christ.
	Proficiency with social media platforms, analytics and digital marketing tools.
	Proficiency in tools such as Canva, Adobe Creative Suite, or similar design/video apps.
	Strong writing skills, eye for photography, videography and visual storytelling.
	Highly organized, self-motivated, and detail-oriented.


Added Advantage:


	Experience managing social media for a church, non-profit or ministry.
	Familiarity with live streaming and church-specific digital media practices


Salary
N70,000 monthly.

Method of Application&nbsp;

Social Media Specialist Job at El-Shaddai Covenant Ministries




        
    

        
        El-Shaddai Covenant Ministries is a Christ-centred community built on love, faith, and fellowship, dedicated to building a people of power, purpose, purity, and passion for Jesus Christ. Our purpose is to "build lives together" by responding to God, reaching people, reinforcing relationships, raising leaders, and realizing destinies.

This involves ministering salvation, adopting people into God's family, developing healthy relationships, training converts to spiritual maturity, and empowering believers to fulfill their God-given potential.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Specialist
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Job Location:  Abule-Egba, Lagos
Employment Type: Part-time

Position Overview


	We are seeking a creative and passionate Social Media Specialist to lead our church’s online presence. This role is perfect for a storyteller at heart—someone who loves to design, write, and share content that inspires, encourages and engages.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and manage a consistent social media content calendar.
	Create inspiring and visually engaging posts, reels, stories, and videos for platforms like Instagram, Facebook, YouTube and TikTok.
	Capture and share moments from worship services, ministries and community events.
	Write thoughtful captions that connect people with scriptures, sermons and church life.
	Foster engagement by responding to comments, messages, and interactions in a warm and Christ-centered way.
	Stay updated on creative trends in social media and adapts them for ministry purposes.


Qualifications


	2+ years of experience in content creation, social media management or digital storytelling.
	Personal relationship with Jesus Christ.
	Proficiency with social media platforms, analytics and digital marketing tools.
	Proficiency in tools such as Canva, Adobe Creative Suite, or similar design/video apps.
	Strong writing skills, eye for photography, videography and visual storytelling.
	Highly organized, self-motivated, and detail-oriented.


Added Advantage:


	Experience managing social media for a church, non-profit or ministry.
	Familiarity with live streaming and church-specific digital media practices


Salary
N70,000 monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: toyintiti.a@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

	The Marketing &amp; Communications Lead is responsible for executing marketing strategies&nbsp;that drive customer acquisition, brand growth, and revenue generation.
	This role&nbsp;combines marketing management and communications leadership, ensuring consistent&nbsp;messaging, strong brand presence, and effective campaign delivery across all channels.&nbsp;

	Collaborate with Sales and Product teams to convert leads into revenue&nbsp;opportunities.
	Develop customer engagement initiatives that support retention and loyalty.

	Build and sustain relationships with media outlets, influencers, and industry&nbsp;partners.
	Coordinate PR campaigns and press coverage for key announcements and events.

	Measure engagement, reach, and conversion metrics.

Marketing & Communications Lead Job at Expert Listing




        
    

        
        Expert Listing is a proptech platform transforming how Nigerians and Africans discover, and access verified real estate. It is a fast- growing real estate tech startup revolutionizing how people connect with trusted artisans and service providers across Nigeria. We connect buyers, renters, landlords and developers through a direct - access, trust-based marketplace. Our platform helps users find, hire and review qualified professionals for their property needs. Our mission is to eliminate fake listings, reduce agent spam and make verified homes easily accessible.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Marketing & Communications Lead

Job Location: Lagos

Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The Marketing & Communications Lead is responsible for executing marketing strategies that drive customer acquisition, brand growth, and revenue generation.
	This role combines marketing management and communications leadership, ensuring consistent messaging, strong brand presence, and effective campaign delivery across all channels. 
	Working closely with the Marketing Strategist, the Lead transforms strategic insights into impactful initiatives that advance the company’s position in the PropTech market.


Core Responsibilities
Lead marketing execution and growth initiatives:


	Implement strategies developed by the Marketing Strategist.
	Manage digital and offline campaigns that drive sales, customer acquisition, and retention.
	Track performance metrics and optimize campaigns for higher ROI.


Oversee brand communication and content development:


	Supervise creation of marketing and communications materials (social media, press releases, newsletters, videos, etc.).
	Maintain a consistent brand voice and visual identity across platforms.
	Manage internal and external communications to strengthen brand reputation.


Drive customer and revenue growth:


	Collaborate with Sales and Product teams to convert leads into revenue opportunities.
	Develop customer engagement initiatives that support retention and loyalty.


Manage public relations and media engagement:


	Build and sustain relationships with media outlets, influencers, and industry partners.
	Coordinate PR campaigns and press coverage for key announcements and events.


Monitor campaign and communication performance:


	Measure engagement, reach, and conversion metrics.
	Report performance insights to management and recommend areas for improvement.


Coordinate cross-functional collaboration:


	Partner with Product, Sales, and Tech teams to ensure alignment of marketing and communication activities.
	Support product launches, events, and promotional campaigns.


Manage budgets and external resources:


	Allocate marketing and communication budgets efficiently.
	Supervise agencies, freelancers, and vendors.


Minimum Qualifications


	Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field
	Minimum of 3 years of experience in marketing, communications, or growth management
	Proven experience executing integrated marketing campaigns
	Strong understanding of digital and traditional media
	Excellent written and verbal communication skills
	Familiarity with real estate or PropTech industry trends.


Skills / Competencies:


	Strong marketing campaign and communication management skills
	Proficiency in digital marketing and media engagement tools
	Excellent writing, editing, and content development ability
	Strong analytical and reporting skills
	Cross-functional collaboration and leadership ability
	Brand management and storytelling expertise
	Budget and vendor management experience
	Understanding of real estate and PropTech markets.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Application to: recruitment@expertlisting.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
